description: Mystical practices in Iran. Shoreh Aghadashloo narrated this documentary. Explores practices rarely if ever seen on film before.
name: Mystic Iran: The Unseen World

review.name: Welcome to my beautiful homeland; Iran
review.reviewBody: In this personal documentary, Aryana Farshad seeks out the spiritual rituals connected with sacred sites in Iran, her home country which she has not visited since the establishment of the clerical regime of Mullahs in Iran for more than twenty-five years. She documents prayer at the Great Mosque of Qom, Kashan, the land of Zarathustra, and male and female dervishes in Kurdistan. Through her examination of these various spiritual influences, she comments on the use of religion as a buffer between the pull of Western culture and the rules of traditional society. the film is beautifully narrated by the Academy Award nominee Shohreh Aghdashloo.
